ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to check if Manual Quote Reason is populated for a Manual Quote when moving form Prove to Negotiate and Resolve.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( AND ( /*Check for Record Type*/ OR ( $RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OpportunityRTDirectReOrder, $RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.FieldServices, $RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.IndirectFieldServices, $RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.IndirectReOrder ), /*Check for Exit Stages*/ NOT ( OR ( TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost, PRIORVALUE ( StageName )= $Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost, PRIORVALUE ( StageName )= $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned, PRIORVALUE ( StageName )= $Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageDevelop ) ) ), AND ( /*Check for Record Type*/ OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OpportunityRTDirectStandard, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OpportunityRTIndirectStandard ), /*Check for Exit Stages*/ NOT ( OR ( TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost, PRIORVALUE ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned, PRIORVALUE ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned, PRIORVALUE ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageCreate, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageQualify, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageDevelop, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageProve ) ) ) ), TEXT ( Account.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Account.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Distributor__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Distributor__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Lessor_Customer__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Lessor_Customer__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, /*Check if Manual Quote Reason is Populated*/ NOT ( ISBLANK ( Manual_Quote_Number__c ) ), ISBLANK ( Manual_Quote_Reason__c ), NOT ( OR ( ISCHANGED ( Is_Updated_By_System__c ), Is_Updated_By_System__c = true, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileSystemAdmin, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileDataSteward ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Quote is manual, please indicate Manual Quote Reason (Quote & Order Information section).
